original_title: Black Label Society - The European Invasion Doom Troopin' Live
overview: This DVD contains footage from guitar virtuoso Zakk Wylde's band, Black Label Society, on their 2005 Tour of Europe. Featuring concerts at the Elysee Montmartre in Paris, and the Astoria in London, as well as candid behind the scenes footage.
title: Black Label Society - The European Invasion Doom Troopin' Live
